title: Katsitsanóron

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Once per game, Katsitsanóron may publicly announce a formation. If all living players of Katsitsanóron's alignment select to form, all players of Katsitsanóron's alignment wins and everyone else loses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You start off on either the Good or Evil team, and change your alignment depending on your living neighbors alignments. (If one neighbor is evil / one good, you have a 50% chance to change alignment each night, if both are evil, you stay evil, etc.)
- If you fail to start a formation, you will commit suicide over the guilt of failing to unite the town.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Form the town anew, or live to see the (good/evil) team win.

fields.name: Mechanics:
fields.value:
"Evil Team" = Anything other then NB, Town/Town Alternates.
"Good Team" = Town Alternates, Town, NB.
